Uses of Package
org.dellroad.stuff.spring

Packages that use org.dellroad.stuff.spring
org.dellroad.stuff.spring Spring related classes. 
 

Classes in org.dellroad.stuff.spring used by org.dellroad.stuff.spring
HibernateIsolationJpaDialect.TransactionDataWrapper
          Wraps superclass transaction data and adds isolation level to restore.
ThreadLocalContext
          Associates a ConfigurableApplicationContext with each thread.
ThreadTransactional
          Works just like Spring's @Transactional annotation, but instead of using a fixed PlatformTransactionManager stored in a static variable and determined once at startup, this annotation uses a PlatformTransactionManager found dynamically at runtime in the application context that is associated with the current thread by the ThreadLocalContext singleton.
